useCase.name: Manage Interview Participant Selection
useCase.description: As a User Researcher, I want to efficiently select interview participants from the Research Participant Database and send invitations to them using the Research Recruitment Tool.

preconditions.precondition: The User Researcher has identified the criteria for selecting interview participants.

successEndConditions.condition: The final list of interview participants is confirmed and scheduled for interviews.

mainSequence.step: Query potential participants from the Research Participant Database
Send invitation for interview to selected participants
Report responses (accept/decline) to the User Researcher
